nationality.infer_reason: Born in Guangzhou and relocated to Hong Kong at age 21, indicating Mainland Chinese origin.
nationality.source: The defendant was born in Guangzhou in July 1956 and is 68.

age_at_offence.source: The defendant was born in Guangzhou in July 1956 and is 68.

age_at_sentencing.source: The defendant was born in Guangzhou in July 1956 and is 68.

gender.source: The defendant was born in Guangzhou in July 1956 and is 68.

parental_status.source: The defendant contributes about RMB800 towards his daughter’s living expenses, who is 18 years old and studying nursing in Guangzhou.

conditions.source: The defendant suffers from cardiac disease, diabetes, kidney problems, hernia and polyps. He had undergone angioplasty procedure during his remand.

At the time of sentencing, the applicant was a former drug abuser aged 68 ... He has since quit his drug use and plans to be reunited with his daughter in the mainland upon release, and to never return to Hong Kong.

occupation.source: The defendant was working as a construction site worker in 2015, earning around $30,000, when he suffered a hand injury forcing him to stop.

monthly_wage.source: He had to rely on CSSA of $5,300 per month for his daily and medical expenses since 2017.

criminal_record.source: The defendant has 19 convictions from 6 court appearances. He was convicted in 1979 for 7 charges of theft, together with one of rape and one of robbery ... His last conviction was on 2 October 2019, when he was sentenced to 18 months’ imprisonment for possession of dangerous drugs.

positive_habits_after_arrest.source: He has since quit his drug use and plans to be reunited with his daughter in the mainland upon release, and to never return to Hong Kong.
